subject: [perl #42352] [TODO] fix or remove strange TODO item in hash() op
body:
# New Ticket Created by  Paul Cochrane 
# Please include the string:  [perl #42352]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue. 
# 


In src/ops/pmc.ops within the hash() op, there is a todo item which is
just marked with XXX.  There is no explanation as to what to do.
Either this should be worked out and fixed, or the todo item should be
removed (with a good reason as to why).
